QuestData.Title: Firewing Signets
QuestData.Description: It is no secret that Kael'thas Sunstrider perceives us as a great threat. Let's face it - not many sin'dorei, fresh from Silvermoon, are willing to join the sort of company that Kael keeps.$B$BIt's also no secret that this is not just a war of words. Scryers and the armies that serve Kael'thas attack each other on sight. The only way to prove you're with us, $n, is to do your share of fighting.$B$BKael's lower ranking followers wear Firewing signets to indicate their rank. Bring them to me.
QuestData.LogDescription: Magistrix Fyalenn in Shattrath City wants you to bring her 10 Firewing Signets.$B$BPerforming quests for the Scryers will cause your Aldor reputation level to decrease.
QuestData.RewardText: Well done, $n. You might prove to be a useful ally after all.
